Plot: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.
Title: And So It Goes
Actors: Michael Douglas, Diane Keaton, Sterling Jerins, Annie Parisse
tomatoConsensus: And So It Goes aims for comedy, but with two talented stars stuck in a half-hearted effort from a once-mighty filmmaker, it ends in unintentional tragedy.
